tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE endangered_species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    habitat_id INT,
    habitat_name VARCHAR(255),
    habitat_location GEOGRAPHY
)

CREATE TABLE endangered_species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(50),
    habitat_id INT,
    population_size INT,
    habitat_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE distribution (
	distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	species_id INT,
	habitat_id INT,
	CONSTRAINT species_fk FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species(species_id),
	CONSTRAINT habitat_fk FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES habitats(habitat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE spatial_information (
	spatial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
	longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
	habitat_id INT,
	CONSTRAINT habitat_fk FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES habitats(habitat_id)
);
